episodes.title: LDS Cover-Up? Bountiful Child Abuse Ring Exposed | Justin Riggs @LDSAbuse Joins Kresha Kay
episodes.description:
📄 Livestream Description:

⚠️ TRIGGER WARNING: This livestream discusses allegations of child sexual abuse and institutional cover-ups. Viewer discretion is advised.

Join Kresha Kay Easton on @DifficultResearch for a powerful and urgent livestream today, September 7, 2025, at 10 AM CDT, featuring special guest Justin Riggs from @LDSAbuse.

Together, we'll peel back the layers of a decades-old child sex abuse case in Bountiful, Utah, where allegations point to a disturbing cover-up involving high-ranking LDS Church leaders.

At the center of this case are Brenda and Dick Miles, the daughter and son-in-law of Russell M. Nelson, the current prophet of the Mormon Church. Plaintiffs allege horrific abuse dating back to the 1980s, claiming church leaders used their influence to suppress the truth and silence victims.

This livestream will also connect the dots between this case and other high-profile scandals, including:

 * The Daybell Case: Examining the alleged connections and the wider network of individuals involved in the killings and conspiracies.
 *Thom Harrison: Author of Visions of Glory and retired child sexual abuse therapist. Cofounder of EternalCore with Ken Krogue of InsideSales.com. 
 * Tim Ballard's Network: Looking at the various organizations under his leadership, such as Operation Underground Railroad, The Nazarene Fund, and others.
 * Jodi Hildebrandt & Ruby Franke: Discussing the child abuse case and its ties to extreme ideological circles.
 * David Hamblin: Highlighting the allegations of ritualistic abuse and institutional secrecy.
 * Julie Rowe: Investigating her role and influence within the broader landscape of religious and political figures who may be leveraging their positions for personal gain.

This isn’t just about one case—it’s about a pattern of institutional silence, power, and pain that extends to the highest levels.

💔 Violent crime is indiscriminate. Its devastating impact extends to every aspect of our daily lives. The effects of violent crime are long-lasting, leaving a lasting legacy on the memories of victims and the survivors who must carry this burden for the rest of their lives. Thank you so much for your love and support! I couldn't do this without you!


📌A short bio on Justin Riggs:
 * X (formerly Twitter): @ldsabuse

Justin Riggs is an investigative researcher, journalist, and founder of the platform LDS Abuse. He holds a master's degree in Adult Education and Training and uses his platform to act as a whistleblower against institutional abuse. He was a lifelong member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints until his excommunication earlier this year, an action that was taken due to his work exposing systemic problems within the church.

Riggs's research and reporting have uncovered what he alleges are hidden connections between the church and the CIA, and have revealed a systemic issue of ritual abuse. He emphasizes that his findings are supported by verifiable evidence and have been corroborated by numerous victim testimonies. Riggs believes the Church, as a corporation, prioritizes protecting its brand over the well-being of its members and abuse victims. His goal is not to tear down the church, but to eradicate the systemic abuse that has persisted with little public scrutiny.

episodes.title: Clergy Privilege & Child Abuse: A Lawsuit that Could Change the LDS Church
episodes.description:
In this special collaboration with @Joe Schmoe on YouTube, we're discussing the groundbreaking lawsuit against The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints concerning its clergy-penitent privilege. A recent court ruling in Arizona, delivered by Judge Laura Cardinal, has stated that the church cannot refuse to answer questions or turn over records in a child sex abuse case, a decision that could set a major legal precedent.

We'll be diving deep into the Paul Adams case, where two bishops and church leaders are accused of negligence for not reporting abuse. The core issue is whether a confession of abuse is protected by confidentiality, even after the abuser posted videos of his crimes online. This case brings to light the church's use of a "help line" that critics say can divert abuse accusations away from law enforcement and to church attorneys.

Join us as we explore the legal, ethical, and moral implications of this ruling. We'll be breaking down the arguments from both sides and discussing what this could mean for the future of child protection policies and the church's accountability.

episodes.description:
On November 1, 2019, Melani Boudreaux Pawlowski and her uncle Alex Cox continuously (imo) harassed Brandon and Claudia Ewell (friends of her and her estranged husband at the time, Brandon Boudreaux) in an attempt to obtain custody of their four children who were in danger of possibly having the same fate as their cousins, Tylee Ryan and JJ Vallow, who disappeared in September of 2019 from Rexburg, Idaho and were later found dead on Chad Daybell’s Salem Idaho property after a 9 month search for their whereabouts. This police interview is now that much more alarming because of details that were revealed in the Idaho trials that Chad and Lori had also rated two of the Boudreaux children as being “dark.” There’s no telling what might have happened had Melani been able to get her children that day. Like Summer Shiflet said in an interview when referring to the incident involving her brother Alex Cox in the shooting death of my uncle Charles Vallow on July 11, 2019, that had Alex not been there that day, (to “protect Lori”) perhaps Tylee and JJ would’ve been on the news for a much different reason. Something close to what she said. I reciprocate the sentiment.

episodes.title: Unlocking the Pace Memo: Key Insights for the Daybell Case | LIVE with @Joe Schmoe
episodes.description:
Get in-depth analysis of the Pace Memo LIVE with @Joe Schmoe and me. We'll break down the document, discuss its relevance to the Daybell case, and offer our expert perspectives. Don't miss this crucial discussion!

Glenn L. Pace was a prominent figure within the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, serving as a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy. He was known for his direct and often candid approach in addressing sensitive topics within the church. The "Pace Memo" refers to a document he authored, intended for church leadership, which addressed concerns about potential financial mismanagement and ethical issues related to the church's welfare program. While never officially released by the church, the memo became public, sparking significant discussion and controversy regarding transparency and accountability within the organization.

The "Pace Memo" refers to a controversial internal document written by Glenn L. Pace, a former General Authority of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. It became a point of significant discussion regarding the church's financial practices and welfare system. Here's a breakdown of its key aspects:
Author and Context:
Glenn L. Pace served as a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy.
The memo was reportedly written in the early 2000s and was intended for internal church leadership.
It addressed concerns related to the handling of welfare funds and potential financial mismanagement.
Content and Concerns:
The memo raised questions about the allocation and use of church welfare resources.
It expressed worries about a perceived shift away from the original intent of the welfare program, which was to provide direct assistance to those in need.
It also touched upon issues of transparency and accountability in the handling of church finances.
Public Disclosure and Impact:
The memo was never officially released by the church.
However, it was leaked and circulated online, generating considerable attention and discussion among church members and the public.
It fueled debates about the church's financial practices, the role of its welfare program, and the importance of transparency.
It contributed to discussions about how the church handles its vast financial wealth.
Church's Response:
The church did not officially confirm or deny the memo's authenticity.
Church leaders generally emphasized the integrity of the church's financial management and the effectiveness of its welfare program.
Generally the church does not comment on internal documents.
The Pace Memo remains a significant point of reference in discussions about the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints' financial practices and welfare system.

episodes.title: My Mom’s Story: Kay Vallow Woodcock [LIVE] on the Lori Vallow Daybell Trial

As the sister of Charles Vallow and grandmother of JJ Vallow, Kay's story is one of loss, resilience, and an unwavering pursuit of justice. We explore her experiences on the witness stand, the pain of reliving the events, and her determination to honor Charles' memory.

Prepare to be moved by Kay's courage and honesty as she shares:
The raw emotions of testifying against her former sister-in-law.
Her personal recollections of Charles and the void his absence has left.
Her reflections on the heartbreaking loss of JJ and Tylee.
Her hopes for the trial's outcome and the fight for accountability.

Amidst the gravity of her testimony, Kay will also reveal a few lighter, even funny, moments, such as a surprising detail from the swearing-in. But most notably, she'll discuss her now-famous "Oh boy!" - the words she spoke just moments before she faced the person convicted of murdering her grandson, step-niece, and beloved big brother for the first time in six harrowing years.

This is a story of family, love, and the enduring strength of the human spirit. Please watch and share.

episodes.title: Watch Live: Lori Vallow Daybell Trial: Opening Statements - 11 AM PACIFIC | ARIZONA
episodes.description:
Friends, family, and members of the public,

Tomorrow, the first pitch will be thrown in the state of Arizona as opening statements commence in the case against Lori Vallow Daybell. This day marks a significant milestone in my journey to hold her accountable for the devastating ambush and murder of my beloved uncle, Charles Vallow.

On July 11, 2019, Charles stepped up to the plate, expecting to be at the rental house he so generously provided for Lori – a home intended to foster stability for his children, JJ Vallow and Tylee Ryan, young lives tragically cut short by Lori’s heinous actions, for which she has already been convicted.

But instead of a routine visit, my uncle was blindsided, ambushed at home plate by Lori’s own brother. This was no accidental hit-by-pitch; this was a calculated fastball aimed directly at taking him out of the game of life.

And let us not forget Tammy Daybell, another innocent life stolen, the wife of Lori’s current husband, Chad Daybell, the doomsday fanatic now sitting on death row in Idaho for his role in these very same murders. While Chad’s stench lingers over this entire ordeal, and while he should also face scrutiny for any involvement in my uncle’s death, my focus today, and tomorrow, remains squarely on Lori Vallow Daybell. He’s not even worth a bench-clearing brawl’s attention right now.

My uncle Charles was a true team player, a kind, humble, and caring man who loved his wife, cherished their blended family, bled silver and blue for his Dallas Cowboys, and found joy in the crack of the bat and the slide into home. He often spoke of life in terms of baseball, and today, as we step into this courtroom, we carry his spirit with us.

Tomorrow, the prosecution will step up to the mound, ready to throw strike one in laying out the evidence of Lori Vallow Daybell’s guilt in my uncle’s death. We have been in the on-deck circle for far too long, waiting for our chance to see justice served.

We believe that the evidence will be irrefutable, each witness a solid hit, each piece of testimony another runner advancing. And in the end, we are confident that the truth will cross the plate, delivering a grand slam for justice. Lori Vallow Daybell will be found guilty.

As my uncle Charles always said, "Love Always Wins." And tomorrow, we take a crucial step towards ensuring that his love and his memory prevail over the darkness that took him from us

#LoveAlwaysWins #CharlesVallow #LoriVallowDaybell #DoomsdayCultMom #LoriVallow #LoriDaybell #OpeningStatements #ArizonaTrial #Live #TrueCrime

episodes.title: High Blood Pressure, Cool Demeanor: The Contradictions of Alex Cox's Bodycam
episodes.description:
The key themes that emerge from the analysis of Alex Cox's bodycam footage and transport to the police station are:

Deception and Concealment:
The contrast between his calm demeanor and high blood pressure suggests he may be actively concealing his true emotions or intentions.
His ability to engage in casual conversation implies he can put on a "mask."
Motive and Intent:
The "protector" role he claims raises questions about whether the "Pew Pewing" was truly self-defense or motivated by loyalty to Lori Vallow.
The possibility of premeditation is considered.
Lori Vallow's Influence:
The analysis emphasizes the enmeshed relationship between Alex Cox and Lori Vallow and the potential for her influence to have driven his actions.
His devotion to her, shown by him quitting his job, is a large theme.
Narrative Control:
His immediate claim of self-defense indicates an attempt to control the narrative from the outset.
Lack of Emotional Response:
His ability to remain calm and have casual conversations after a violent act suggests a potential lack of remorse or emotional detachment.
Investigative Red Flags:
The analysis identifies several red flags that investigators should consider, including inconsistencies in his statements and his overall behavior.
Psychological State:
His psychological state is a large theme, and is considered to be a large factor in the analysis.
Relationship Dynamics:
The dynamic between Alex and Lori, is a huge theme, and a large factor in the analysis.

episodes.title: Finally! The Pace Memo: A Reading (w/Lori Vallow Daybell & Ruby Franke in mind)
episodes.description:
Glenn L. Pace was a Presiding Bishop in The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. This means he held a high-ranking position within the church’s leadership, responsible for overseeing the church’s temporal affairs, including finances, welfare, and real estate. 

In the early 1990’s, Pace was tasked by the First Presidency (the highest governing body of the church) to investigate claims of ritualistic abuse within the church. These claims, often involving allegations of satanic rituals, sexual abuse, and psychological manipulation, were deeply concerning to church leaders at that time. What ever came of it? 

This is why I think it is so important to share with you that I am of the strong opinion that this is what spilled over into my own family’s murders in 2019. I don’t think this issue was ever addressed and as a result, here we are today, with the same issue raging in not only the Vallow/Daybell case, but also in the Hamblin Case, the Franke-Hildebrandt case and many more cases that perhaps we should consider as well. Let me know your thoughts in the comment section. You guys are the best in these YouTube True-Crime streets! Thanks for your support! #LoveAlwaysWins #lorivallowdaybell #chaddaybell #trial #update #alexcox #truecrimecommunity #arizonatrial #latest #lawsuit #arizona

episodes.title: Ruby Franke and Jodi Hildebrandt Sued in Federal Court for Fraud, Racketeering
episodes.description:
A former client accused the incarcerated therapist and mommy vlogger of using their life coaching business to financially control their clients

We will go live @3pm central 

A former client of Jodi Hildebrant is suing the Utah therapist and her business partner, 8 Passengers’ Ruby Franke, for fraud and racketeering connected to Hildebrant’s life coaching business, ConneXions Classroom. The two pleaded guilty to aggravated child abuse in 2024 and were each sentenced to four to 30 years in prison, but the client claims that there are illegal aspects of ConneXions still thriving while Hildebrandt is behind bars. Representatives for Hildebrandt and Franke did not respond to Rolling Stone’s request for comment. 

In a lawsuit filed on Jan. 22, plaintiff Michael Robert Tilleman accuses Hildebrandt and Franke of using ConneXions to manipulate therapy clients into paying exorbitant fees for services, and isolating and alienating them from family and friends until they are under financial and emotional control. “Franke, Hildebrandt, and others known and unknown have been engaging in a widespread racketeering enterprise in pursuit of power and profit through the advertisement, sale, and provision of fraudulent services and products designed to prey on vulnerable individuals, and encourage victims to perpetuate illegal acts onto others,” the suit claims.

Welcome to my channel! I'm Kresha Easton, a member of the Woodcock family and a niece of Charles Vallow. As the aunt of JJ Vallow and cousin of Tylee Ryan, I am on a mission to seek justice by uncovering the troubling beliefs of my former aunt, Lori Vallow, and her husband, Chad Daybell. Throughout this journey, I’ve encountered powerful individuals within the mainstream system, revealing the truths we’ve been misled about. By subscribing to my channel, you can help amplify the voices of Tylee, JJ, Tammy, Charles, and Joe.
Join me in this critical endeavor to tell their stories and advocate for meaningful change in policy and prevention. Support my journey seeking justice through understanding Via:

episodes.title: Julie Rowe: The Time Is Now For A Callout-Episode 1 (AVOW) Another Voice of Warning
episodes.description:
Welcome to my channel! Don't forget to subscribe, like, and comment to receive notifications for my new content, and your support helps me grow!

A Controversial Visionary

Hello, and welcome to my channel! Today, we're diving into the intriguing world of Julie Rowe, a self-proclaimed visionary whose influence has sparked both fascination and controversy within the Mormon (LDS) community.

In 2020, I discovered a 69-page PDF crafted by a member of the Mormon church. This individual undertook the substantial task of compiling the document to monitor Julie's activities on the LDS AVOW website (Another Voice of Warning) and to delve into the history and context surrounding Julie Rowe's involvement in the Latter-day Saints movement.

Julie Rowe emerged as a prominent figure in the LDS cultural landscape through her claims of near-death experiences and prophetic visions. Her books and speaking engagements garnered a significant following, as she shared her insights and predictions about future events. 

Connections with Influential Figures
Rowe's connections with figures like Chad Daybell, Thom Harrison, and Tim Ballard have further fueled public interest. Each of these individuals has been notable in their own right, and their interactions with Rowe have sparked conversations and debates within the community.

As we explore Julie Rowe's impact, it's essential to recognize the cultural revolution she helped ignite within the LDS community. Her ideas and teachings have challenged traditional beliefs, prompting both support and criticism. While some view her as a spiritual guide,
others see her influence in a more controversial light.

In this video, we'll delve into how Julie Rowe's visionary claims have been perceived. We'll examine the dual nature of her influence-how she has inspired many to seek deeper spiritual understanding, while also raising questions about the reliability and impact of her predictions.


Join us as we explore the captivating story of Julie Rowe, her connections, and the cultural shifts she has inspired. Whether you're familiar with her work or hearing about her for the first time, this journey promises to be both enlightening and thought-provoking. Don't forget to like, subscribe, and hit the notification bell to stay updated on our latest content!

As we seek justice, we remember those we've lost. Join us every week for intense discussions about the cases of Lori and Chad Daybell. We continuously deep dive into the bizarre religious rabbit holes and learn more about those who are intertwined with the infamously murderous doomsday cult couple.  All of this information will bring more truth and awareness to the victims and  together, WE continue their legacy.

episodes.title: New Federal Lawsuit Alleges Tim Ballard Ran Trafficking Operation
episodes.description:
Anti-Trafficking Activist Tim Ballard Hit With Human Trafficking Allegations in Federal Lawsuit

Let’s talk about this! (Yay!). 

The former head of Operation Underground Railroad and inspiration for Sound of Freedom has already sued the plaintiffs for defamation in a previous suit. 
Tim Ballard, the anti-trafficking activist whose wildly exaggerated missions abroad were the basis of the hit 2023 film Sound of Freedom, is facing a new legal action from six women who last year sued him for sexual exploitation — leading Ballard to sue them for defamation earlier this month.

The latest complaint is the first federal suit targeting Ballard; it comes from accusers Celeste Borys, Mary Hall, Sasha Hightower, Krista Kacey, Kira Lynch, and Bree Righter. The filing names Ballard associates Matthew Cooper and Michael Porenta, as well as Ballard’s former organization, Operation Underground Railroad (OUR), as defendants. OUR forced out the founder and CEO shortly before Sound of Freedom amplified his celebrity, due to internal complaints of sexual misconduct. A lawyer for Ballard denies the allegations. An OUR spokesperson tells Rolling Stone the suit contains “recycled claims” and that the organization is “confident” they will be dismissed. Porenta did not immediately respond to a request for comment, while Cooper could not be reached for comment.

https://www.rollingstone.com/culture/culture-news/tim-ballard-human-trafficking-allegations-federal-lawsuit-1235140274/

episodes.title: AUDIO: Judge finds ‘extraordinary circumstances’ in Chad Daybell case, grants attorneys more time
episodes.description:
ST. ANTHONY — A judge has found there are “extraordinary circumstances” in Chad Daybell’s case and granted his appellate attorney’s request for more time in filing for post-conviction relief.

During a hearing Wednesday morning, Judge Steven Boyce heard argument from Ian Thomson, one of Daybell’s three Idaho appellate public defenders. The judge denied a request to allow video or still photographers in the courtroom and the hearing was not livestreamed on his YouTube channel.

Daybell said nothing during the hearing as he appeared via Zoom from the Idaho Maximum Security Institution in Boise wearing a dark green jumpsuit.

Thomas listed multiple reasons why more time is needed to effectively file for post-conviction relief, which is a process wherein a defendant asks the court to vacate or modify a judgment of conviction, or to reduce or modify a sentence.

The last hearing on the matter:
https://www.youtube.com/live/awgstDTF5pY?si=iKKGCBfeLJRiaPD3

episodes.title: Utah mom accused of poisoning husband, Khouri Richins-Preliminary Hearing-Day One
episodes.description:
Khouri Richins Preliminary Hearing-Day One

A Utah mom who wrote a grief book for (her) chilldren, Khoiuri Richins is accused of poisoning her husband Eric Richins. Today, the judge will hear from 3-4 witnesses, which could span into tomorrow, to see if there is enough evidence to forward to a jury trial. 

During Wednesday’s status hearing, it was revealed prosecutors intend to call four or five witnesses throughout the preliminary hearing. The defense meanwhile plans to call one or two witnesses.

Richins is scheduled to appear in a multi-day preliminary hearing starting Monday morning, Aug. 26. She faces a first-degree felony aggravated murder charge and attempted criminal homicide among other charges of drug distribution, fraud, and forgery in connection to the death of her husband, Eric Richins.
The main concern presented by Judge Richard Mrazik surrounded out-of-court statements provided by two witnesses who may be called to the stand during the hearing. The two witnesses reportedly provided statements about conversations with Eric just months before his death when he first claimed Kouri was attempting to poison him.

Kouri’s new defense attorneys, Kathy Nester and Wendy Lewis, objected to various parts of the statements, claiming they were not reliable hearsay and should not be admissible.
Judge Mrazik overruled the defense’s objections for the sole purpose of the upcoming preliminary hearing. Mrazik, however, agreed with the defense that they reserve the right to object to the statements outside of the preliminary hearing.

Nester then requested Richins to appear in the courtroom without being in handcuffs as she has in previous hearings. In her request, Nester said “We, as a defense team, do not feel any threat. We feel very safe sitting next to her.” She also said the bindings would make it difficult for Richins to take notes during the hearing and would be a distraction for the defense team.
Mrazik did not offer a ruling on whether or not Richins would be free of handcuffs during the multi-day preliminary hearing. He first wanted to consider the request with the Summit County Sheriff’s Office before making a decision.

It has been more than a year since Richins was initially arrested and charged with the murder of her husband. Legal hold ups including controversy over the now-infamous “Walk the Dog” letter as well as a change in attorneys for Richins have prevented the case from going to a preliminary hearing thus far.

episodes.title: TIM BALLARD STILL ‘NO RELATION’ TO APOSTLE M. RUSSELL BALLARD (I was wrong..for now)
episodes.description:
Unveiling Tim Ballard's Lineage: A Journey into the Past

Explore the hidden secrets of Tim Ballard's ancestry with this video I prerecorded from November 26, 2023. It was my first quest to discover the truth behind Ballard's lineage. 

I recorded it and then almost deleted it because of the WRONG CONCLUSIONS that I made towards the ending but, rather than having to do a whole new video, I decided to upload the original one and share with you all. With the correction of course. 

**The video reveals that there is no relation between Tim and M. Russell Ballard's son, Craig, as previously assumed. Despite this setback, we remain hopeful and determined in our efforts in seeking justice through understanding.**

The story unfolds further in the form of a riddle. Lawsuits allege that Janet Russon, Tim's psychic, invoked the ancient prophet "Nephi" during seances, scrying and automatic writings. Russon has tried to distance herself from these allegations during her appearance on (@ Last Dispensation’s YouTube channel.

Attempts to deflect criticism and embarrassment have been apparent in recent public statements. Russon has clarified in her own audio recording that she is calling up the legendary Mormon prophet Nephi than Tim's great x grandfather, Nephi Anderson. 

Despite the challenges, the journey into Tim Ballard's past provides a glimpse into his origins, offering insight into his character and the journey that led him here. The quest for truth and justice continues, fueled by the forces of love and compassion.

Join the movement with hashtags #lovealwayswins #justicefortyleeandjj #justicefortyleeandjj #justiceforcharlesvallow   #justicefortammydaybell  #justiceforjosephryan #timballard #our

The timing of public shaming and lawsuits against Tim Ballard

It’s suspicious that the public shaming of Ballard days before several lawsuits were filed against him. Former female operative allegations against him include sexual, spiritual, financial and personal misconduct came while he was promoting himself as a savior who would rescue thousands of children and women from the sexual slave trading industry, but it appears that Tim’s motives were not entirely genuine.

Live Coverage of Chad Daybell's Court Hearing – Join Us!

We invite you to follow the latest developments in Chad Daybell's court hearing, where Judge Boyce is set to hear several motions. These include requests to remove the death penalty, allow cameras in the courtroom, and change the venue from Ada County (Boise, Idaho).

Chad Daybell is fighting for his life, facing severe charges, including multiple counts of conspiracy to commit first-degree homicide and fraud. The case revolves around his late wife Tammy Daybell, and the deaths of JJ Vallow and Tylee Ryan.

Chad Daybell's current wife, Lori Vallow Daybell, has already been convicted of similar crimes to her fifth husband. She is now facing charges in the death of her then-husband, Charles Vallow.

The hearing is set to take place on November 29, 2023, and the judge will announce the decision on removing the death penalty. Stay tuned for live updates on the outcome of the hearing.

Based on the information Blaze News has received from eight former OUR associates, Russon has had undue influence on Ballard, and therefore on OUR operations, for many years, perhaps even a decade or more. episodes.title: Missing Arizona Teen (of alleged Doomsday Mormon Mom…FOUND…SAFE!!
episodes.description:
AZ dad Ben Thibaudeau fears doomsday wife may have crossed into CANADA after snatching their 16-year-old son and flying to Idaho with her daughter and brother - because they believe the boy is the 'key' to the SECOND COMING

Ben Thibaudeau says his son Blaze, 16, has been stolen by his estranged wife after she became obsessed by the Second Coming of Christ. 
His wife Spring Thibaudeau abruptly bought survival gear and cut all communication before the move 
Fears are mounting for Blaze's safety over concerns he could be 'restrained' or 'incapacitated' in religious ceremonies. 

Ben Thibaudeau fears his son Blaze, 16, may have been snuck into Canada by his estranged wife Spring, who he says abruptly bought thousands of dollars of survival gear and cut off all communication because she believes their son has been chosen by God.

The boy is believed to be with his devoutly religious Mormon mother, sister Abi Snarr, 23, and uncle Brooke Hale - but his father believes the teen has been taken against his will and is concerned for his safety. 
https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-12680085/amp/Doomsday-Arizona-mom-survival-blaze-thibaudeau-Idaho-vanishes-Second-Coming.html

episodes.title: Melani Pawlowski To Appear Before Mesa Municipal Court-Computer Tampering Charge
episodes.description:
Melani Pawlowski To Appear Before Mesa Municipal Court | 10/19 Computer Tampering Charge @ 1:30 pm Mountain Time (12:30 pm pacific, 3:30 pm central, 4:30 pm eastern)
Pawlowski identity theft investigation

—New details in Mesa PD’s identity theft investigation of Pawlowski alleged she used a copy of a $12,000 check deposited into Boudreaux’s business bank account to present as an exhibit during a family custody hearing. Boudreaux and Pawlowski went through a long court battle over their four children, after their 2019 divorce. 
—According to Mesa’s police report, Pawlowski agreed to take herself off the bank account for Boudreaux’s business known as Cougar Consulting. Bank records show Pawlowski accessed the Chase Bank account several months after signing the divorce decree. Investigators say Pawlowski was supposed to remove herself from the account no more than 60 days after the sale of the former couple’s property on October 3, 2019. The account was accessed sometime after March 2, 2020.
—"Garrett told me it is not Melani’s fault that Brandon was ‘dumb’ and did not change the login information until three days after Melani accessed the online account," the detective recounted in the police report. 
—Smith told police that Pawlowski believed Boudreaux owed her money from the check and that is why she logged into the account to get a copy to her attorney.
—The investigation concluded with the detective finding probable cause to charge Pawlowski with one count of computer tampering which is a class 3 felony. 
—"Melani Pawlowski knowingly accessed Brandon Boudreaux’s Chase Bank business account for Cougar Consulting," reported the detective. 
—The charge against Pawlowski has been dismissed, according to the court on Sept. 26.
—New details surrounding the family of Lori Vallow continue to emerge, months following the disappearance of two children with ties to Arizona.
—Pawlowski has a criminal record in Utah. She was arrested for criminal trespassing with a domestic violence enhancement in November 2019 when police say she tried to get her children who were staying with Boudreaux’s parents in American Fork City in two separate incidents. The grandparents called 911 when Pawlowski would not leave the property. 
—Pawlowski was convicted and then sentenced in December of 2020 and put on probation according to court records.

RESEARCHING THE CASES OF MORMONS WHO WERE NOT ONLY ACTIVE AND DEVOUT MORMONS AT THE TIMES OF THEIR ALLEGED CRIMES (some serving higher callings in the institution and/or even being referred by and paid for by the larger institution in question here… allegedly?) LET ME KNOW WHAT OTHER 'CONNEXIONS' YOU MAKE BETWEEN THE TWO AND LET'S FURTHER DISCUSS IN THE COMMENT SECTION DOWN BELOW...

Ruby Franke & Mormon Therapist Jodi Hildebrandt Appear In Court-Multiple Counts of Child Abuse 

Jodi Hildebrandt, a Licensed Therapist in Utah, teamed up with a well-known YouTube Family Vlogger, Ruby Franke, who is a “Mommy influencer”. . Was Arrested & Charged with Child Abuse for Allegedly starving and possibly torturing Franke’s children. The child who was able to escape from Jodi Hildebrandt’s 3 million dollar lair in Southern Utah (near St. George) was described by a neighbor as asking for food and water and described by the neighbor as being emaciated by his mother and her business partner, Jodi Hildebrandt. Hildebrandt has been a licensed therapist and comes highly recommended by the Church of Latter-day Saints for Bishops to recommend to his Members that the couple be counseled by. 

The boy, 12 years old, escaped from his mom’s business partners three million dollar home and ran to a nearby neighbor for help with food and drink. In the 911 call, the neighbor described the boy as being “emaciated” and told dispatch that he appeared to have been bound with duct tape and had multiple wounds. He even became emotional during the call because of how the minor had apparently been held against his will and that he obviously suffered from the abuse. Let's Discuss. Join the conversation here:

Jodi Hildebrandt, a Licensed Therapist in Utah, teamed up with a well-known YouTube Family Vlogger, Ruby Franke, who is a “Mommy influencer”. . Was Arrested & Charged with Child Abuse for Allegedly starving and possibly torturing Franke’s children. The child who was able to escape from Jodi Hildebrandt’s 3 million dollar lair in Southern Utah (near St. George) was described by a neighbor as asking for food and water and described by the neighbor as being emaciated by his mother and her business partner, Jodi Hildebrandt. Hildebrandt has been a licensed therapist and comes highly recommended by the Church of Latter-day Saints for Bishops to recommend to his Members that the couple be counseled by. 

The boy, 12 years old, escaped from his mom’s business partners three million dollar home and ran to a nearby neighbor for help with food and drink. In the 911 call, the neighbor described the boy as being “emaciated” and told dispatch that he appeared to have been bound with duct tape and had multiple wounds. He even became emotional during the call because of how the minor had apparently been held against his will and that he obviously suffered from the abuse. Let's Discuss. Join the conversation here:
#jodihildebrandt #mommyvloggers #mommyinfluencers #mormoninfluencers #mormon #rubyfranke #8passengers #connexions #vallow #daybell

episodes.description:
MORMON MILLIONAIRE’S DAUGHTER | CHARGED IN MURDER OF EX HUSBAND, JARED BRIDEGAN, MICROSOFT EXECUTIVE. 

Shanna Lee Gardner- Fernandez was arrested on August 17, 2023 in Washington state for allegedly murdering her ex husband, Jared Bridegan, in Jacksonville Florida, as he was driving home from parenting time with he and Shanna’s twins (boy and girl). 
Jared had his 2 year old baby girl in the backseat when he noticed a spare tire obstructing the roadway on his route back home. He got out to move the tire so he could pass when he was gunned down in front of his two year old daughter.  

This case reminds me of Melani Boudreaux Pawlowski in the case of Brandon Boudreaux who was shot at by Alex Cox and where Lori Vallow Daybell was indicted for Conspiracy to commit murder back in October of 2019. in his route from dropping their shared children off at home with Shanna and as he was returning home with his then 2 year old baby girl whom he had with his current wife, Kirsten Bridegan. 

We will be following this case and plan to stream any updates and court dates in the future. The first stream will be on September 14, 2023 when Shanna is to appear in court to answer to her charges. #justiceforcharlesvallow #justiceforjosephryan #jaredbridegan #shannagardner

episodes.title: Want To Know What Lori Vallow Daybell Meant During Her Allocution Speech At Her Sentencing?
episodes.description:
‘Mormon Splaining’— Explaining the MEANINGS Behind The Things That Lori Vallow Daybell Said In Her Allocution Speech Before Being Sentenced For the Murd3rs Of Her Two Children, Tylee Ryan & Joshua JJ Vallow and Conspiring to Kill Chad Daybell’s Late Wife, Tammy Daybell. 

Judge Steven W. Boyce then sentenced the “translated being” to 3 LWOP sentences and ordered her to pay restitution for fraudulent crimes she committed against the US Government. (Arizona has already ordered the extradition of Lori to face criminal charges in Maricopa County for the murder of MY uncle, Charles Vallow as well as the attempt on Brandon Boudreaux’s life). 

So, in the sense of “like-minded people”, Lets take a fun look at what Lori Daybell meant by things like, “Eternal Friend”, “Busy”, “Commanded”, “Being a Personal Witness to Jesus Christ” and “Adult Spirits” were all about. Nothing better than getting “greater light and knowledge”. We will also talk about some of the other Mormonology related things that we’ve heard from these deplorable individuals throughout the case. A insightful discussion that will surely help us to  get a better view with our getting “justice through understanding”. 

I really dove deep into this one and am looking forward to sharing my research with you. We will have many questions answered by the end of this case. 
This’ll be a fun one for us to do as a community so please, join us for this latest plunge into Lori Vallow Daybell’s “Bizarre Religious Rabbit Hole”.

episodes.description:
How do you think Chad & Lori Vallow Daybell will respond & react with one another? It will be the first time they will be together/in person, since Lori was arrested (early 2020). That’s a long dang time y’all! I think It will create more questions (as expected) but will also answer some of the questions we’ve all asked since the beginning of their unraveling and alleged murder spree. 

Join me Tuesday 9a/cst, 10a/Eastern, & 8a/Mountain. (The livestream is scheduled an hour earlier than the actual court hearing). It will  allow us time to wake up, settle in, & chat about this & other topics relative to the cases, on Tuesday, August 16, 2022. 

**My Uncle Charles Vallow Would Have Turned 65 on August 17, 2022!  May He Rest In Eternal Peace. I love and miss my uncle every single day. There’s not one moment in my day that I’m not thinking of him, Tylee, JJ, Tammy, & Joe. I pray for love, light, happiness, peace, humility, grace, forgiveness, & healing. But most of all, I pray for swift & smooth justice to be served to all who have been wronged by their offenders. 

God does not sleep and WE will all be judged by our works, repentance, grace, & our sins. We are all sinners saved by the Grace of Our Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ. Lord, please pray for us sinners. We love you & only want to do your Will. Amen.

LIVE @ 8/7c. SUNDAY SIDEBAR- TODAY I AM HAVING MY DAD, LARRY WOODCOCK JOIN IN TO HOMOR HIM FOR FATHERS DAY, ALONG WITH KJ in the RAY, & MY MAMA, KAY VALLOW WOODCOCK CHIMES IN EVERY NOW AND AGAIN BUT IS ALSO IN CHAT WITH EVERYONE ELSE. 

WE DID DISCUSS CHAD AND LORI VALLOW DAYBELL BUT AT BARE MINIMUM TODAY BECAUSE THAT SUBJECT TENDS TO WEIGH HEAVY ON OUR HEARTS. 

IN HONOR OF JOSEPH RYAN AND CHARLES VALLOW WHO WEREN’T GIVEN THE CHANCES TO BE WITH THEIR CHILDREN ON FATHERS DAY. TO ALSO THANK GOD AND WISH BRANDON BOUDREAUX A HAPPY FATHERS DAY. SO GRATEFUL HIS LIFE WAS SPARED!! 

**I also broke the news to our community regarding MANDY LEGER, who is JJ VALLOW’S BIRTH MOTHER. SHE AND MY BROTHER TODD TRAHAN ARE THE BIRTH PARENTS OF JJ VALLOW. THEY NAMED JJ “CANAAN TODD TRAHAN” @ BIRTH WHICH THEN CHANGED TO JOSHUA “JJ” VALLOW ONCE LORI VALLOW AND CHARLES VALLOW ADOPTED HIM. 

WELL, MANDY PASSED AWAY THIS PAST WEEK. HER TWIN SISTER JOINED US IN CHAT AND SHE IS JJ’S OTHER BIOLOGICAL AUNT (MATERNAL), AS MANDY WAS HER TWIN SISTER. WE ARE TRULY SADDENED BY THIS DEVASTATING NEWS. 
 
I KNOW THIS MUCH, THE RIPPLE EFFECTS OF MURDER CLAIM EVEN MORE VICTIMS BECAUSE WE ARE THE ONES WHO ARE ALSO DEALT A LIFE SENTENCE WITHOUT A TRIAL BECAUSE WE DIDN’T ASK FOR ANY OF THIS TO HAPPEN EITHER. 

So, please keep my family in your prayers but most importantly please send prayers & love/light to Mandy Leger’s Family, her twin sister Nancy Prater and the rest of their nearest and dearest family members and friends. 
I thank you so very much!!

episodes.title: REMEMBERING TYLEE & JJ-“THE DAY THE CHILDREN WERE NO LONGER MISSING. 2 yr. Anniversary LIVE
episodes.description:
LIVE* IS THERE A SUCH THING AS GOOD GRIEF?? - THE DAY TYLEE RYAN & JOSHUA JJ VALLOW WERE FOUND @11:30am. Eastern, 10:30am Central, 9:30am Mountain. 

Please join me for a special livestream in remembrance of Tylee Ashlynn Ryan, 16, and Joshua “JJ" (Jaxon) Vallow, 7,  on the day these two precious beams of light were unearthed from Chad Daybell’s Pet Cemetery and Backyard. 

#Wherearethechildren turned into #WeFoundTheChildren 

•My uncle, Charles Vallow, was murdered in Chandler Arizona on July 11, 2019.  

•After 9 grueling months, I witnessed with my own two eyes, “DARKNESS COME TO LIGHT”. 

•Tylee and JJ had been missing right at 9 months, when FBI Agents, Rexburg Police Department, and Fremont County Police Department, arrived on the Daybell Property in droves. According to News Reporter, Eric Grossarth, with East Idaho News hit his “LIVE” Button and began reporting on the heavy police presence and activity at the residence of Chad Daybell & His Then Late Wife, Mrs. Tamara (Tammy) Douglas Daybell. 

•I remember coming out of a dream-like state and recall vaguely hearing the voice of Eric Grossarth as he was talking in a low voice about the activity at Chad’s property. I immediately sat straight up in my bed and locked eyes with my fiancé Jason’s cell phone where it was showing the live feed of this footage. No words were spoken and we both sat in our bed staring at his phone. We later learned that we were watching with the rest of the world. 
•Nate Eaton wrangled up an entire “chopper” and provided us with live footage from a “bird’s eye view”. It was all far too much for me to handle and process. I can only recall the terror that I felt. One day I’ll be able to effectively share a more in-depth account. 
For now, I just want to thank you for being here with me as I make my way through this journey. #godsarmy

Pt. 1-“Multiple Mortal Probations-As I See It”.  “The Doctrine of Eternal Families”

What can I say, it’s been three years since the murders of my family members, Charles Vallow, Tylee Ryan, and JJ Vallow. Other Victims include Tammy Daybell and Joseph Ryan. 

I’ve been seeking a more defined and concise explanation of the seemingly “problematic” or “controversial” doctrine; “Multiple Mortal Probations”. 

I am only seeking a better understanding of this particular doctrine and doctrines of the like. Chad & Lori (Vallow) Daybell & many others share the same belief in this doctrine. So much so, that Hector Sosa (allegedly) wrote an email to other members of “Pathway to Zion” or PTZ, allegedly stating to specifically not share knowledge of “Multiple Mortal Probations” and “Energy Healing” with leadership (because it would most likely lead to excommunication). Allegedly of course. This email was allegedly shared at the beginning of the unraveling of Chad & Lori’s (alleged) murderous spree.
What about “multiple mortal probations” and “energy healing” would be worth hiding? 
Exactly. If there’s nothing to hide then all should be “Well in Zion”.

I have had the most difficult time with making a  prerecorded video. It’s always been an issue for me to basically talk at a camera with no one to bounce off of. So, I sat down earlier this week and turned on a Julie Rowe Video and well, you’ll see how it turned out. It’s not easy being directly related to an alleged murderer, living it out in “real-time”, in the public eye, in a high-profile case, while having to deal with and work through all the emotional ups and downs that go along with it. It’s difficult. It’s diffiCULT reSEARCH! No doubt about it.

LISTEN TO ANGELINE LAW January 07, 2020, AS SHE TALKS WITH CHANDLER PD; SAYS HER FORMER FRIEND, LORI VALLOW, HAD TOLD HER SHE “HIRED ALEX TO KILL JOE”. SHE LEARNED THROUGH THIS CONVO WITH THE DETECTIVE, OR AT LEAST IT SEEMS LIKE MAYBE ANGELINE DISCOVERS THAT ALEX DID ACTUALLY ATTACK JOE RYAN WITH A TASER GUN AND DID SERVE A RATHER LIGHT SENTENCE IN MY OPINION. I ALSO FEEL THAT THE CRIME DID NOT MATCH THE TIME ALEX SERVED. HE OBVIOUSLY DIDN’T LEARN HIS LESSON AND SEEMS LIKE PERHAPS IT ONLY MADE HIM GROW WITH HATE. I DO NOT FEEL JOSEPH RYAN DIED OF NATURAL CAUSES. IT IS MY OPINION THAT LORI RYAN VALLOW DAYBELL DID ASSASSINATE JOE’S CHARACTER AND MURDERED HIS SPIRIT. I ALSO FEEL SHE DID “POSSESS A MURDEROUS HEART” AND THAT SHE ALLEGEDLY KNEW EXACTLY WHAT TO DO TO STOP THE BLEEDING & STOP THE PAIN”. 
In fact, Lori is rather easy for me to read. Im sure so many others feel the same. She says in her recording at Melanie Gibb’s Home, that she did not like confrontation, she hates to fight. I beg to differ. IN MY OPINION, LORI VALLOW DAYBELL COX LAGIOIA MEANS YANES RYAN INMATE NUMBER ###### LOVES CONFRONTATION. BEHIND BARS, CHAD AND LORI VALLOW DAYBELL, SEEM TO POSSESS MORE RIGHTS THAN US COVICTIMS, BUT I DISAGREE. I KNOW THAT EVERY SINGLE DAY, THOSE WALLS CLOSE IN MORE AND MORE AND EVENTUALLY FEEL SUFFOCATING. IS THAT THE RIGHT WORD? MAYBE ASPHYXIATION? IDK BECAUSE IM NOT BEHIND BARS WITH MULTIPLE INDICTMENTS OF CONSPIRING TO MURDER MY BOYFRIENDS WIFE AND MURDERING MY INNOCENT BABIES. IT MUST FEEL PRETTY CRAPPY LIVING INSIDE YOUR OWN PRISON FOR BOTH CHAD AND LORI. CAN YOU IMAGINE HAVING ALL THAT “LOIN FIRE” WITH NO ONE TO SHARE THAT WITH. OOPS WELL MAYBE NOT SO MUCH LORI BUT IN MY OPINION CHAD IS INTO PORTALS AND IS PRETTY MUCH A FREE CANDIDATE. MAYBE LORI WILL REALIZE THAT SHE MAY POSSIBLY BE SICK BUT ON THE BRIGHT SIDE, IN MY OPINION, MY FORMER AUNT FINALLY GOT EVERYTHING SHE EVER WANTED. MAYBE!? Perhaps. We will never know and also, who cares. I want to begin calling them by their inmate numbers so that they feel dehumanized like they allegedly made those around them that loved them feel. Dehumanized to zombified then mummified. I love knowing they are all in Heaven and will never be hurt by these “pretty birds” ever again. Not in the afterlife either. 
Hey, im only human and sometimes I feel angry. I am going to express my anger and my feelings here. It is my right to do so. They won’t take my rights away from me. I usually would copy & paste into my notes but I shared with my fiancé Jason & he reminded me that it is my right and he agrees with my opinions as being rather true. 

On a different note, thanks everyone for stopping by to say hi and share your thoughts and opinions with me. I really enjoy seeing you all come by and visit. It really helps. I want to thank so many if you who have donated for #Justicefortyleeandjj bracelets! You guys have absolutely no idea just how much your support and presence makes a difference. We are her to advocate for #charlesvallow #Tyleeryan Tammydaybell #jjvallow & Joeryan 
Their voices were robbed from them. Not on my watch and i know, not on your watches either. Thank you for rallying around me, my family, as well as Annie, and anyone else standing up and being the voices for our family members. #LoveAlwaysWins

The Spirits Of Tylee, JJ, Charles, Tammy, & Joe Live On. Their Light Can Never Be Extinguished.  I Know This Because I Feel Their Spirits All Around Us. I Love How They Have United Us From All Around The World. From Every Race, Creed, Religion, Gender, Political Stance, Perspectives, Walks Of Life, Young, & Old. This Is Where I See & Feel Them The Most, As Do The Rest Of Our Families. Do we miss them? Yes!! Every moment of every single day. Is this difficult for us to do especially in “real time” and “in the public”? Yes! It’s rather intimidating & even scary in my opinion but I also question how families deal with this when they have a missing, lost, or murdered loved one fall victim!! This is the most difficult time I’ve ever experienced & I love hearing from each and everyone of you who support me & my family as we journey towards justice. Is it easy? Absolutely not. Is it worth it? Yes, THEY’RE WORTH IT! Sometimes we get all caught up in the evil details of Chad Daybell & Lori Vallow Daybell & we lose focus as to who lies at the heart of the matter. It’s just a reminder to everyone following these cases. I appreciate you for INVESTING in our families.
Every one of you invest your time, energy, money, expertise, & degrees into the victims & our families. I feel that we can never thank you enough quite honestly. It’s beautiful, it’s reassuring, & comforting. 
I thank you from the bottom of my heart & appreciate your generosity. Every little bit will help me turn this negative into many positives by building their website, keeping up with the costs for this channel, & establishing foundations in their names so that their legacies may live on & help victims & families of victims in the future. We’ve got a lot of work ahead of us with changing many things like, protocols, process & procedures, laws, grief groups, child protection, all the way to gender discrimination. There’s so much to think about & put pen to paper. Please feel free to share your ideas & thoughts on where changes can be made. I do need help with technical issues, streamlining everything, & basically anything else w/building their platform. Its for Tylee, JJ, & Charles. I do everything by myself. From editing & uploading videos, learning youtube & livestreaming, researching constantly, grieving, processing, keeping up w/ court movements, planning & coordinating trips to attend trial(s), conversing & responding to comments on social media platforms, designing merch to generate funding, retain attorney to create non profits in Tylee, Charles, & JJ’s names. There’s so much work involved & its more difficult doing alone. I don’t mind but it’s taking me forever to accomplish. My parents are on board but just aren’t quite ready to deal with or take on at this time, Understandably so. I think it has been the only thing holding me together. I’ve never been anyone to ask for help but God has a way of humbling us. I realize that its too much on one person. So I am asking for help from anyone who feels up to the challenge. Thx so much. Kresha0123@gmail.com

From Every Race, Creed, Religion, Gender, Political Stance, Perspectives, Walks Of Life, Young, & Old. This Is Where I See & Feel Them The Most, As Do The Rest Of Our Families. Do we miss them? Yes!! Every moment of every single day. Is this difficult for us to do especially in “real time” and “in the public”? Yes! It’s rather intimidating & even scary in my opinion but I also question how families deal with this when they have a missing, lost, or murdered loved one fall victim!! This is the most difficult time I’ve ever experienced & I absolutely love hearing from each & everyone of you who support me and my family as we journey towards justice. Is it easy? Absolutely not. Is it worth it? Yes, THEY’RE WORTH IT! Sometimes we get all caught up in the crazy & evil details of Chad Daybell and Lori Vallow Daybell and we lose focus as to who lies at the heart of the matter.. Tylee, JJ, Charles, Tammy & Joe. I just want to remind myself & all of you who follow these cases, just how much I appreciate you for INVESTING in our families. Every single one of you invest your time, energy, money, expertise, & degrees into the victims & to our families. I feel that we can never thank you enough quite honestly. It’s beautiful, it’s reassuring, & comforting. 
I thank you from the bottom of my heart and appreciate your generosity. Every little bit will help turn this negative into so many positives by building their website, keeping up with the costs for this channel, & establishing foundations in their names so that their legacies may live on & help victims and families of victims in the future. We’ve got a lot of work ahead of us with changing many things like, protocols, processes, procedures, laws, grief groups, child protection, all the way to gender discrimination. There is so much to think about & put pen to paper. Please feel free to share your ideas & thoughts where changes can be made. I do need help with technical issues, streamlining everything, & basically anything else you can think of in building their platform. Its for Tylee, JJ, & Charles. I do everything all by myself, from editing & uploading videos, learning youtube & livestreaming, researching constantly, grieving, processing, keeping up with court movements, planning & coordinating trips to attend trial(s), conversing & responding  to comments on social media platforms, designing merch to generate funding to retain attorney to create non profits in Tylee, Charles, & JJ’s names. There’s so much work involved in doing this & its even more difficult doing on my own. I don’t mind but it is taking me forever to accomplish. My parents are on board but just aren’t quite ready to deal with or take on at this time. Understandably so. I think it has been the only thing holding me together. I have never been a person who asks for help but God has a way of humbling us & I realize that this is too much on one person. So I am asking for help from anyone who feels up to the challenge. Please email me kresha0123@gmail.com. 
Thank You so much for your love and support. #LoveAlwaysWins 💜💙

episodes.title: CHAD DAYBELL AUDIO OF HIM CALLING TO MAKE ARRANGEMENTS FOR CHARLES VALLOW CREMAINS #LORIVALLOW
episodes.description:
Chad Daybell called an Arizona funeral home the day Charles Vallow was shot and killed by Lori Vallow Daybell's brother, according to newly released police documents. He spelled his name as Chad "Dabal" and asked how much a cremation would cost.

A transcript of the phone call to Valley of the Sun Mortuary and Cemetery was included in a Chandler police report. The call was made just before 8 p.m. on July 11, 2019. Vallow would have been shot and killed about 12 hours earlier, according to documents.

"Um, we just had a death in the family and, we really don't want anything but a cremation and then to send the cremains to a family in Louisiana," Daybell asks the funeral home employee in the recorded call. "Just a simple no, nothing other than the cremation and sending him to his family for a service in Louisiana. So, is, is there any way to know a ballpark price on that."

Daybell claimed to be from Iowa and said his uncle "John Dabal" had died at the hospital. He said the body would be taken to the medical examiner and explained he wanted the body cremated in Chandler before shipping the cremains to New Orleans.

"And we'll deal with the service latter (giggles)," the transcript of the call reads. "So just trying to get a ballpark price."

The funeral home gave Daybell a quote for around $2,000, which included shipping of the remains. Daybell said he would call other funeral homes for estimates and the call ended.

The day after Vallow was shot and killed, Lori Vallow sent a text to his two sons who lived in another state.
"Hi boys. I have very sad news. Your dad passed away yesterday.

I'm working on making arrangements and I'll keep you informed with what's going on. I'm still not sure how to handle things. 

Just want you to know that I love you and so did your dad," Lori said

episodes.description:
LORI VALLOW With JJ Vallow & Tylee Ryan @ BK DRIVE THRU AFTER CHARLES MURDERED Allegedly, With BRO ALEX

#justicefortyleeandjj #justiceforcharlesvallow #lovealwayswins #justiceforjosephryan #justicefortammydaybell #chaddaybell  #lorivallowdaybell #loridaybell 

How can someone be so cold & callous. I see her in the Burger King drive through as I have my entire life. Calm, cool, collective, normal everyday shit here folks. WTF!? I must have missed the memo on this and I am blessed that I did. How do you load your kiddos up into your estranged & now Murdered/dead husband, taking his phone, wallet, keys to the rental he was using, and drive through a fast food chain and pretend it’s just “Business as usual”? Hearing about it and having to just picture it is so very different than actually seeing it. I don’t understand why this evil 8i+€h has been in my family and our lives for this long and just flips this kind of switch. Unrecognizable and unbelievably deceptive and just diabolical.

I balled through Tylee’s entire interview time. I will use her humming as my channel which is their channel for intros and outtros. I’ll use it everywhere so people can hear TYLEE’S VOICE. It was ignored, muted, never acknowledged and I be damned if that continues to be the case. I love my family angels. I miss them every moment of every day. I have got to do something big. Not just one big thing but a limitless amount of big things that will help anyone who needs help, advocacy, a voice, safe place, and I welcome and would be honored to help any race, creed, political status, color, gender, every human being that lives with  all of us on this planet. Anyone and everyone. 

Sorry I know this is such a rant but it needs to be heard, taken seriously, positively, and it needs people who are serious about changing our world. It begins within and works outwardly from there. In my opinion at least. #lovealwayswins #justicefortyleeandjj  #justiceforcharlesvallow #justicefortammydaybell #justiceforjosephryan #loridaybell #ldsfraud #lds #mormon #jjvallow #zulemapastenes #cultmom #zulema #alexcox #melaniegibb #davidwarwick,#ianpawlowski #melanipawlowski #BrandonBoudreaux  #AprilRaymond

(For Info Only) Allegedly, this is the day Chad & Lori meet and are secretly sealed in the Mesa Temple. ALLEGEDLY! If this is the case, then this would be the beginning of the end for many. 

   I find it hard to believe that a couple who are already married to other people, would just meet and begin a murderous path of destruction.  It just doesn’t make sense to me at all! Can you imagine meeting under the same circumstances? Would you have been swept away by such wild and outlandish ideas? Angel Moroni? Jesus Christ being in attendance? Somehow sneaking a Temple Sealing without obvious clearance? It’s absolutely insane in my opinion! What do you think? What other theories do you have? Please feel free to share opinions and drop a comment and just say HI! 

💙💜💙💜💙💜

   I am so grateful to have you here & hope you plan on sticking around. I appreciate your support and I absolutely find interacting with everyone so very healing! I love hearing from you, where you’re from, hearing your opinions and stories! I am absolutely blessed to have found this loving community! Tylee, JJ, Charles, and Also Tammy and Joe, have brought us all together and it is most definitely the silver lining from all these tragedies.

I am asking for help with expenses involved in establishing a NPO and for travel expenses to and from Idaho & Arizona (depends upon Lori’s Competency). This video is intended to bring awareness to the recent murders of my family members. Charles Vallow was my Uncle. Tylee Ryan was the bravest young lady I have ever known. And JJ Vallow, he was my 7 year old autistic nephew. Tylee and JJ were murdered and found buried in shallow graves on the property of Chad Daybell on June 9, 2019. They had been missing for 10 months prior to their discovery by Rexburg LE and FBI Agents. Tylee’s body had been dismembered and showed evidence that someone had tried to burn her remains. JJ was buried on Chad Daybell’s property. LE found his remains in a shallow grave and covered with Concrete Bricks and wood panelling. JJ’s body was wrapped tightly within a large black trashbag with another white bag covering his head. Upon removal of the bags revealed an overt/abundant amount of duct tape covering from his nose area, over mouth, down his arms and hands, and his ankles. He was wearing red pajamas and was found with a baby blue blanket. My Uncle charles had been ambushed and murdered by his brother in law #alexcox in july of 2019.

episodes.title: David Warwick Speaking About His Visions (For Info Purposes Only) #lovealwayswins #lorivallowdaybell
episodes.description:
David Warwick. Who is David Warwick? 

Speaking About His “Alleged” Dreams & Visions on August 19, 2016, in front of fellow active members of the church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints and “like-minded people” who are alleged to have gathered and possibly still gather regularly to hear speakers like David Warwick, Shawn Littlebear, Julie Rowe, Chad Daybell, Jason Mow, Rod Meldrum, Melanie Gibb, Lori Vallow Daybell, and so many others. 

(For Informational Purposes Only, Not Made For Reproduction, Do Not Copy). 

Before 2019, I had never asked questions like this one. However, in July of 2019, my uncle, Charles Vallow, was senselessly (allegedly) murdered by his estranged wife (now, my former Aunt Lori Vallow Daybell) and her brother, Alex Lamar Cox.  
My life changed in an instant. Since that date, I began asking questions into who David Warwick truly is and what exactly is he about.  He and Melanie Gibb married on December 12, 2020. 

Fun Fact: on December 11, 2019, authorities exhumed the body of Chad Daybell’s former late wife, Tamara “Tammy” Douglas Daybell, to perform an autopsy since one wasn’t requested by the Daybell Family.  The elected coroner also failed to order an autopsy at the time of Tammy’s death. It was just automatically ruled as “natural causes” by the coroner.

Fun Facts: Alex Lamar Cox died on December 12, 2019. 

•December 12, 2019,  
Tammy’s body was exhumed, tested, and reinterred. 

•David Warwick and Melanie Gibb married one another on the one year death anniversary of Alex Cox.

This video is intended to bring awareness to the recent murders of my family members. Charles Vallow was my Uncle. Tylee Ryan was the bravest young lady I have ever known. And JJ Vallow, he was my 7 year old autistic nephew. Tylee and JJ were murdered and found buried in shallow graves on the property of Chad Daybell on June 9, 2019. They had been missing for 10 months prior to their discovery by Rexburg LE and FBI Agents. Tylee’s body had been dismembered and showed evidence that someone had tried to burn her remains. JJ was buried on Chad Daybell’s property. LE found his remains in a shallow grave and covered with Concrete Bricks and wood panelling. JJ’s body was wrapped tightly within a large black trashbag with another white bag covering his head. Upon removal of the bags revealed an overt/abundant amount of duct tape covering from his nose area, over mouth, down his arms and hands, and his ankles. He was wearing red pajamas and was found with a baby blue blanket. My Uncle charles had been ambushed and murdered by his brother in law #alexcox in july of 2019.

episodes.title: Charles Vallow Body Cam Footage/01-31-19/GilbertPD #justiceforcharlesvallow #justicefortyleeandjj
episodes.description:
Charles Vallow Body Cam Footage/01-31-19/GilbertPD... @ this point in time, my uncle, Charles Vallow, had received physical threats from #lorivallow, his wife of 14 years. While away on a regularly scheduled business trip to Texas, Lori had cancelled his return flight home resulting in charles having to purchase a plane ticket just to get back to their home in AZ. Lori had withdrawn $35,000.00 from his business account and moved it to their joint account, then moved the cash one more time into an unknown bank account in which Charles had no access to. This resulted in Charles scrambling to find funds  just to make payroll for his employees/business partners. Lori never returned the $35k back to Charles. Lori  & “a friend” who i believe to be #MelanieGibb , conspired with Lori in going to airport in phoenix to steal AND hide #CharlesVallows truck so he would be without transportation upon arriving back from his business trip in Texas. Lori used many forms of sabatoge to make EVERY SINGLE THING MORE DIFFICULT FOR MY UNCLE who was just trying to get home, to his family, just like he had done for the past 14 plus years. He lands at airport in AZ and learns his truck has been taken by Lori. Charles had to call their mutual friend and refers to this friend as  “Bishop”. Gabe Bonilla is “Bishop” and he picked my uncle up from airport and gave him a ride to the home that Charles and Lori shared together. Charles had to call Gilbert Pd to go through the proper channels in gaining access to his home because Lori had changed the locks as well. I feel its important to watch all footage as much as possible. I know that every time i watch footage from these body cams and court proceedings, I learn something new or pick up on something that I had previously missed. 
Note: Soon after this day 01/31/19, lori and tylee would disappear on a 58 day hiatus. Lori never contacted my uncle charles NOR their son JJ. She abandoned them. She abandoned JJ. 
I wish things would have turned oit different for my nephew JJ, Tylee, and my Uncle Charles. The only thing we can do at this point is to make sure they receive the justice owed to them. #ChadDaybell &  #loridaybell  need to be locked away for life (PLUS BE SENTENCED TO LIFE IN PRISON ON ALL THEIR OTHER MULTIPLE PROBATIONS (lives) ON EVERY PLANET). #Justiceforcharlesvallow #justicefortyleeandjj #justicefortammydaybell #justiceforjosephryan #lovealwayswins #tyleeryan #jjvallow #tammydaybell #josephryan #doomsday #cult #mommydoomsday #cultmom #lds #mormon #alexcox #melaniegibb #melanipawlowski #brandonboudreaux #zulema #pastenes #preparingapeople #anothervoiceofwarning #julierowe #ericsmith #avrahamgileadi #vallow #rexburg #chandler #gilbert #jasonmow #gabebonilla #rodmeldrum #nancyjames #mikejames #hectorsosa #visionsofglory #pontius #mechellemcdermott #latterdaymedia #comefollowme #warchapters #timetowarriorup #murder #falseprophet #god #translatedbeing #ianpawlowski #johnprior #markmeans #robwood #missingkidsfromidaho #kauai #mesatemple #temple #deathpenalty #woodcock #kaywoodcock #larrywoodcock #grandparents #kresha #kreshaeaston #difficultresearch #vallow #daybell #warwick #shawnlittlebear #danjudd #tammyjudd #aprilraymond #latterdaysaints #dreamsofzion #pathwaytozion #ptz #churchofthefirstborn #bloodatonement #ritual #satanic #mikestroud #chellemcdermott #shellygirl #energyhealing #portals #gods #moroni #warchapters #fbi #davidwarwick #priesthood #secretsocieties #secretcombinations #pap #avow #christopherparrett

episodes.title: Trish & Kresha-1st Public/Live chat about Charles Vallow JJ Vallow, Tylee Ryan  09/30/20~date aired
episodes.description:
Trish & Kresha-1st Public/Live chat about Charles, JJ Vallow, Tylee Ryan  09/30/20~date aired. Trish @whitenoiseopedcommentary and I met when Trish had reached out to me as we were frantically trying to find the whereabouts of my nephew JJ Vallow and Tylee Ryan. #wherearethekids signs were plastered all across America and even beyond our borders. I never expected to find such a genuine and compassionate friend while we were in the midst of all this chaos and confusion. I am forever grateful that Trish and I crossed paths. She has been so supportive and so compassionate towards me and my family. She has also helped me with opening up and kept gently nudging me towards actually speaking publicly about how the disappearances and murders of my uncle, nephew, and Tylee had affected me and had forever changed my life. Trish happened to live in Louisiana which is where we reside as well so she put forth so much effort into making this meeting and YouTube video come into fruition.
